info.sourceTextContent: Por esto no quiso el Adelantado volver á embarcarse, antes procuró deshacer las náos y caminar por tierra, y llegó á la Asumpcion con 300 hombres, de 400 que habia embarcado;[22] porque los demas habian muerto de enfados y enfermedades.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Why would not the Come back to embark before the ships attempted to break and walk on land, and came to the Assumption with 300 men, 400 who had embarked; [22] because the others had died of anger and disease.
